title: Ticket #7191: Clarify job event log number 009 text
description:
And asks about the following: "By the user?" 

Episode4.log
009 (251059.002.000) 07/16 12:37:35 Job was aborted by the user.
        Job removed by SYSTEM_PERIODIC_REMOVE due to more than 10 restarts

We will drop the last three words of the first line, since the second line will always specify the correct actor anyway. This will break old parsers, but since we've broken them already in this dev series, we might as well make the improvement.
remarks:
2019-Aug-06 12:20:55 by tlmiller:
Update the documentation as necessary; add a release note.

2019-Aug-06 17:42:37 by tlmiller:
Verified that the new parser can read old logs.

2019-Oct-08 13:08:27 by tlmiller:
Moved further work to #7307.
